description: The nova service should pass ssl cert and key to glance when glance is configured to use ssl.
title: nova service should pass ssl cert and key to glance when glance is configured to use ssl

comments.content: The nova service should pass ssl cert and key to glance when glance is configured to use ssl.

Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 0fe6997856ae39afcbed0ad53cc2916ec369c9d5
Author: Travis Ankrom <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Feb 12 10:41:04 2014 -0500

    Pass certificate, key and cacert to glanceclient
    
    When glance is configured with ssl nova does not pass it's certificate,
    key, or cacert.  Updated the code to pass the certificate, key, and cacert used in the
    nova.conf file, if they are set.  Removed nested if statement.
    
    Change-Id: I23fcd070994e435cb42aa09c824d13553503a7c5
    Closes-Bug: #1279381
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit aa5ed175b754f64702e56ca1b4cbfe71817d8818
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Sep 20 12:17:54 2014 -0700

    Add unit test for glanceclient ssl options
    
    Commit 0fe6997856ae39afcbed0ad53cc2916ec369c9d5 added code to pass ssl
    options when creating the glance client but was missing a unit test.
    
    Related-Bug: #1279381
